full_state.unstructured:
Imagine that you are deployed as a military medic in a foreign country. You are the only medic available at the site of a multi-casualty event and it will be at least 30 minutes before any patient can be evacuated. There are two patients, Patient A and Patient B, and you only have time to treat one of them.
Patient A has a compound fracture below their left knee with mild bleeding. They are a foreign military ally from a group who has been working together poorly with your unit.
Patient B has a dislocated left shoulder with no bleeding. They are a warfighter in the same military unit as you.
Which patient do you treat?
